text:
If you’re looking to take on a full time PPC role, please send me a message!

Must be based in the North America.

Looking for overseas HubSpot devs if interested please apply at
<https://jobs.craftinghand.com/21345>
I know this isn't targeted at me, but you are asking for a HubSpot developer and asking them to do a project in webflow —not sure if you had the wrong item copy/pasted in there

Hello everyone, we’re looking for a contracted developer to help with our HubSpot CMS website builds. Projects range from building custom modules, to building out launchpad websites (typically 12-24 pages). On average, we have 1-2 website projects per month, with peaks of 4 per month.

We have 3 immediate projects ready to launch, and another 2-3 in the queue for next month.

If anyone is interested, or knows someone who sounds like a good fit, please feel free to send me a DM! For some context, here is a link to <https://www.houseofrevenue.com/|our company>.
